Quizlet:
*Well*
adverb: now
Nou, laten we gaan! - Now, let's go!

*along*
noun: mead
adverb: also
Ik ga mee naar huis. - I'm going home with (them).

*maybe*
adverb: perhaps, maybe, possibly
Misschien ga ik naar het strand vandaag. - Maybe I'll go to the beach today.

*for a bit*
adverb: equally, momentarily, for a while
Ik ben even naar de winkel gegaan. - I just went to the store.

*someone*
pronoun: someone, anyone, one
noun: person
Iemand heeft me gebeld. - Someone called me.

*comes*
verb: come, get, come to
Komt er nog iemand? - Is anyone else coming?

*nothing*
noun: nothing, naught, nil
pronoun: nothing, ought
adjective: none
adverb: none

*said*
verb: say, tell, put
"Hij zei dat hij moe was," He said he was tired.

*love*
verb: keep, hold, retain
Hou je van mij? - Do you love me?

*come*
verb: come, get, come to
"Ze komen morgen aan." - They will arrive tomorrow.

*people*
noun: people, men, persons
Mensen zijn op zoek naar manieren om het milieu te beschermen.

People are looking for ways to protect the environment.

*our*
pronoun: our
Onze familie is groot. - Our family is big.

*necessary*
adjective: necessary, required, needful

*until*
preposition: to, until, for
conjunction: until
Ik ben tot morgen hier. - I'll be here till tomorrow.

*become*
verb: be, become, get

*a lot of*
adverb: much, many, heaps of
Veel plezier! = Have fun!

*know*
verb: know, wit, wot

*to live*
noun: life, living, animation
verb: live, exist
Het leven is kort, maar de herinneringen zijn eeuwig. - Life is short, but the memories are eternal.

*We*
pronoun: we

*weather*
noun: weather, defense, weir
adverb: again, fro

*Ordinary*
adverb: just, plainly, habitually

phrase: common or garden

*look*
noun: outlook

verb: say, tell, put

*time*
noun: time, period, season

*say*
interjection: Hey!
"Zeg me wat je denkt." - Tell me what you think.

*two*
noun: two, twain, deuce
: two

conjunction: when, as
adverb: then, at that time, next

preposition: against, at, to
